title: Get the results of an asynchronous campaign copy task

headers.name: Access-Token
headers.description: Authorized access token. For details, see Authentication .

parameters.name: task_id
parameters.description: ID of the asynchronous campaign copy task. To get the task ID, use /campaign/copy/task/create/ .

top_fields.name: code
top_fields.description: Response code. For the complete list of response codes and descriptions, see Appendix-Return Code .

top_fields.name: message
top_fields.description: Response message. For details, see Appendix - Return Codes .

top_fields.name: request_id
top_fields.description: The log ID of a request, which uniquely identifies the request.

fields.name: task_status
fields.description: The status of the asynchronous campaign copy task. Enum values: RUNNING : The task is being processed. SUCCESS : The task has been processed. Check the task_result to see if the task has succeeded. FAILURE : The task fails to be processed.

fields.name: task_info
fields.description: Overview of the task result.

fields.name: total_ad_count
fields.description: The total number of ads that you tried to copy.

fields.name: success_ad_count
fields.description: The number of ads that have been successfully copied.

fields.name: total_smart_creative_adgroup_count
fields.description: The total number of Smart Creative ad groups that you tried to copy.

fields.name: success_smart_creative_adgroup_count
fields.description: The number of Smart Creative ad groups that have been successfully copied.

fields.name: task_result
fields.description: The details of the task result.

fields.name: campaign_id
fields.description: The ID of the newly created campaign.

fields.name: campaign_name
fields.description: The name of the newly created campaign. If the campaign copy process fails, this field will still be returned to indicate the campaign that was not successfully copied.

fields.name: campaign_error_infos
fields.description: The errors encountered during the campaign copy process. If no errors occurred, the value of this field will be an empty list ( [] ).

fields.name: adgroup_result_list
fields.description: The details of the ad group copy results.

fields.name: adgroup_id
fields.description: The ID of the newly created ad group.

fields.name: adgroup_name
fields.description: The name of the newly created ad group. If the ad group copy process fails, this field will still be returned to indicate the ad group that was not successfully copied.

fields.name: total_ad_count
fields.description: The number of ads that you tried to copy into the new ad group.

fields.name: success_ad_count
fields.description: The number of ads that have been successfully copied into the new ad group.

fields.name: adgroup_error_list
fields.description: The errors encountered during the ad group copy process. If no errors occurred, the value of this field will be an empty list ( [] ).

fields.name: ad_status
fields.description: The result of copying the ads from the original ad group to the newly created ad group. Enum values: ALL_SUCCESS : All ads from the original ad group were successfully copied. PARTIAL_SUCCESS : Some or all ads from the original ad group failed to be copied.

fields.name: is_smart_creative
fields.description: Whether the new ad group is a Smart Creative ad group. Enum values: true , false .

fields.name: smart_creative_result
fields.description: Returned only when is_smart_creative is true . The result details of the copy of the ad creatives in the original Smart Creative ad group.

fields.name: is_success
fields.description: Whether the copy of the ad creatives used to generate Smart Creative ads in the original Smart Creative ad group was successful. Enum values: true , false .

fields.name: smart_creative_error_list
fields.description: The errors encountered during the copy of the ad creatives in the original Smart Creative ad group. If no errors occurred, the value of this field will be an empty list ( [] ).

fields.name: ad_result_list
fields.description: The details of the ad copy results.

fields.name: is_success
fields.description: Whether the copy of the original ad was successful. Enum values: true , false .

fields.name: ad_id
fields.description: The ID of the newly created ad.

fields.name: ad_name
fields.description: The name of the newly created ad. If the ad copy process fails, this field will still be returned to indicate the ad that was not successfully copied.

fields.name: ad_error_list
fields.description: The errors encountered during the ad copy process. If no errors occurred, the value of this field will be an empty list ( [] ).
